history.content: Send a new one to cs-advising@eecs.berkeley.edu No guarantee it will be included as the deadline has passed and instructions were clear.

Specifically, I want to edit the personal statement section. Is there any way I can do this (even by perhaps sending it straight to an advisor)? There have been some things that have come up since the deadline that I would have wanted to include had they occurred earlier. Please help, thanks!

Edit: I feel like what I would add to my personal statement could drastically affect my chances of being accepted to the major, so I would really appreciate this a lot if I could do this.
history.subject: Any way to edit CS Major Petition?
